definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico

sentences.english: This graphite filled material offers the best bearing surface with hard chrome plated piston rod.
sentences.chinese: 這石墨填充材料提供了硬鍍鉻活塞桿最好的軸承表面。

sentences.english: The methods for measuring the geometry dimension of graphite electrode tapered nipples as well as the measurement mechanism adopted are reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 論述了測量石墨電極接頭的各種方法及測量原理。

sentences.english: Graphene is a two-dimensional sheet of carbon that is only one atom thick.
sentences.chinese: 石墨烯是一種只有一個原子厚度的二維薄碳片。

sentences.english: This graphite could be used in its natural state for writing.
sentences.chinese: 這種石墨可以在自然狀態下用來書寫。

sentences.english: The ends of the graphite are sprayed with metal to form contacts.
sentences.chinese: 石墨的尾端被塗上金屬以形成觸點。

sentences.english: The influence of SG inoculant on graphitizing annealing of malleable cast iron was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了SG變質劑對可鍛鑄鐵石墨化退火的影響。

sentences.english: Thermal Conductivity of CPVC can be improved obviously by powdered graphite filler.
sentences.chinese: 用石墨填充CPVC可顯著提高材料的導熱性能。

sentences.english: Graphite rods are best because they can produce any action that you wish to use.
sentences.chinese: 石墨棒是因爲它們能產生最佳的任何行動，你想用。

sentences.english: In other words, you can do transformation optics using graphene.
sentences.chinese: 換句話說，你就可以利用石墨薄膜來進行變換光學了。

sentences.english: Urine-Determination of chromium-Graphite furnace atomic absorption spectrometric method.
sentences.chinese: 尿中鉻的石墨爐原子吸收光譜測定方法。

sentences.english: The cause and atraumatic method of the break in pipe of graphite heat exchanger are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 分析石墨換熱器列管破裂的原因及其防止的辦法。

sentences.english: Researchers have made the plastic composite strong by adding thin pieces, or ribbons, of graphene.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員通過加入石墨烯薄條來使合成塑料更強。

sentences.english: There are around three million sheets of graphene in a millimetre-thick layer of graphite.
sentences.chinese: 一毫米厚的碳層裏大約有三百萬個石墨烯。

sentences.english: Apart from stiffness, graphene is possibly better known as a potential silicon replacement.
sentences.chinese: 除了剛度，石墨烯更著名的是其有可能替代硅。

sentences.english: A self made graphite platform was installed in pyrolytic graphite tube of graphite furnace.
sentences.chinese: 用自制的石墨平臺安裝於石墨爐中熱解石墨管內。

sentences.english: A self made graphite platform was installed in pyrolytic graphite tube of graphite furnace.
sentences.chinese: 用自制的石墨平臺安裝於石墨爐中熱解石墨管內。

definition: diamond/also called 鑽石|钻石[zuan4 shi2]
rutile (mineral form of titanium oxide TiO2)
